r.s: Communicate with any AMQP compliant server
r.d: This extension can communicate with any AMQP spec 0-9-1 compatible server, such as RabbitMQ, OpenAMQP and Qpid, giving you the ability to create and delete exchanges and queues, as well as publish to any exchange and consume from any queue.
r.n:
- Widen lowest supported librabbitmq version to >=0.8.0 (Lars Strojny <lars@strojny.net>) (https://github.com/php-amqp/php-amqp/issues/441) - New Docker-based development environment (Lars Strojny <lars@strojny.net>) (https://github.com/php-amqp/php-amqp/issues/440) - Prevent duplicate builds (Lars Strojny <lars@strojny.net>) (https://github.com/php-amqp/php-amqp/issues/442)
For a complete list of changes see: https://github.com/php-amqp/php-amqp/compare/v2.0.0alpha1...v2.0.0alpha2
